summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the Civic Center/Municipal Court and Police Headquarters Building project; authorizing the acquisition of certain property and property rights, including all improvements located thereon, in Lots 2, 3, 6 and 7, Block 30 of C.D. Boren's Addition to the City of Seattle (the "Property"); authorizing acceptance of the deed for general municipal purposes; and making an appropriation from the Municipal Civic Center Fund; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
